title: Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, L&T Tech jump over 3%; should you buy IT stocks? - CNBCTV18
content: Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, L&T Tech jump over 3%; should you buy IT stocks?  CNBCTV18
description: Nifty IT jumped more than 2 percent in intraday trade led by gains in Coforge, Wipro, and L&T Technology Services.
